instructions: To turn the camera on, tap the power button on the side. Make sure that the camera is fully charged. Turn on Wi-Fi. You should see a blue Wi-Fi icon on the front of the camera. If you don t see the icon, press the Wi-Fi button on the side of the camera. Make sure that your phone is fully charged. On your phone, open the Settings app. Connect your phone to the 360 camera's Wi-Fi network (which will end in ".OSC"). The default password is the full set of numbers after the uppercase letters on the network. Open the Google Street View app . In the Street View app, choose a capture mode (Interval or Auto). When the phone is connected to the camera, you ll see a blue linked camera .
